item.title: The Note That Killed the FBI
item.description: Agents of the FBI plotted to frame and destroy General James Flynn for politic purposes according to handwritten notes released today. General Flynn, a 30-year Army veteran and 3-star General, pled guilty to false charges in order to protect his family from further harassment by the FBI in 2017. Now, the law firm that once represented Flynn has release thousands of documents it previously illegally refused to turn over. One of those documents is a handwritten note.
